meanings.sent1: She received a donative from the kind stranger.
meanings.sent2: The charity event collected many donatives for the cause.
meanings.sent3: The donative made her smile with gratitude.
meanings.sent4: His donative was a ray of light in her dark day.
meanings.sent5: The donative brought joy to all who received it.

meanings.definition: Given as a gift or donation.
meanings.sent1: The donative gesture touched everyone's hearts.
meanings.sent2: The donative act of kindness was truly appreciated.
meanings.sent3: His donative nature always brightened the room.
meanings.sent4: The donative spirit of the holiday season was contagious.
meanings.sent5: Her donative attitude made the world a better place.
